content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

I've actually been testing that recently with a branch of ssb-server called `debug-scheduler` which has debug statements during gossip. I've noticed that neither of [the relevant calls](https://github.com/ssbc/scuttlebot/blob/debug-scheduler/plugins/gossip/schedule.js#L114-L121) ever actually run, but you can use that branch if you'd like to peek under the hood at what's going on under the hood in the [scuttleguts](%/AWGzqrPX6Ykmk0Sp7uDq78LYX3BgV9X+RToHhx+wzg=.sha256).
